channel.title: Sinon.JS
channel.description: A JavaScript mocking library that makes it easy to test your code.

item.title: Sinon.JS 4.4.0 Released
item.description: Sinon.JS 4.4.0 is now available. This release includes a number of new features and bug fixes.
